message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This amount not only reflects the product's true worth but also allows for a fair negotiation space. I believe this offer presents an attractive proposition, considering the immense value you would derive from it, estimated at $800,000. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail.
